description: This file contains test cases for the 'Agent' class and related components in the 'agno' project, specifically testing interactions with the Vercel model, including synchronous and asynchronous runs, streaming responses, memory handling, and history management.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of interacting with a language model, supporting synchronous and asynchronous operations, streaming, and memory management.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Encapsulates the response from the agent's run methods, including content, messages, and metrics.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in a SQLite database.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to verify that the response metrics contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests a basic synchronous run of the agent with a simple prompt.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses from the agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Tests an asynchronous run of the agent.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to remember context across multiple interactions.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the agent's session history management with SQLite storage.
